@DeAIID At least they've finally handed back the running of the offense to him for now.
@DeAIID As a Wolves fan it was excruciating watching Rubio stand in the corner and shoot threes this season.
@DeAIID Zach's a much better 3 point shooter and gets it done at mid range and finishing. He's definitely their most complete.
@KateMontgom I automatically read 'Picnic' as 'Turkish Delight'.
@WolvesExplosion I thought it looked like Rubio got injured (either the CHI or HOU game) and Dunn was going to end up playing more minutes.
@WolvesExplosion but Dunn hasn't done much wrong.
@WolvesExplosion Why has Dunn's minutes decreased over the last four games? I like Rubio and he's been getting back to what he's good at..
Go #twolves
